price: Do they have a share in the dominion? Even if so, they would not give people even as much as the speck on a date stone.
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ نَصِيبٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُلۡكِ فَإِذٗا لَّا يُؤۡتُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ نَقِيرًا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
